plot: Sadie a woman in her late 20s is dumped by her boyfriend and while feeling sorry for herself a lamppost starts talking to her by flashing at her in Morse Code. Sadie strikes up a friendship...
title: Lonely Lights
plot_es: Sadie a woman in her late 20s is dumped by her boyfriend and while feeling sorry for herself a lamppost starts talking to her by flashing at her in Morse Code. Sadie strikes up a friendship...
